prompt.span: Jimmy’s experiment requires him to tell subjects that they will be working in pairs to solve a problem when in reality he does not care about problem-solving. Jimmy is really observing the nonverbal communication between two people who do not know each other. Which of the following statements is FALSE concerning Jimmy’s research?

simpleChoice.span: Jimmy needs to determine whether deception is essential to the experiment.
Jimmy must tell the subjects that he plans to observe their nonverbal communications.
Jimmy is intruding into the lives of his subjects.
Jimmy must balance the potential harm to his subjects against the value of the research.
